title: Degree and minimal polynomial of algebraic numbers

blocks.name: cdgraa
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the degree function for algebraic numbers.
blocks.origin: const class cdgraa { degAA }

blocks.name: diff.cdgraa.s
diff.cdgraa.c
diff.cdgraa.w
cmpaa
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the minimal polynomial for an algebraic number.
blocks.origin: const class cmpaa { minPolyAA }

blocks.name: diff.cmpaa.s
diff.cmpaa.c
diff.cmpaa.w
df-dgraa
blocks.content: Define the degree of an algebraic number as the smallest degree of any nonzero polynomial which has said number as a root. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.) (Revised by AV, 29-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: df-mpaa
blocks.content: Define the minimal polynomial of an algebraic number as the unique monic polynomial which achieves the minimum of ` degAA ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: dgraaval
blocks.content: Value of the degree function on an algebraic number. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.) (Revised by AV, 29-Sep-2020.)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, caa, cdgraa, cinf(crab(s0, cn, wrex(s1, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), c0), nat0)))), cr, clt), cinf(crab(s0, cn, wrex(s1, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), nat0)))), cr, clt))
  infeq1d(crab(s0, cn, wrex(s1, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), nat0)))), cr, clt, crab(s0, cn, wrex(s1, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), c0), nat0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabbidv(s0, cn, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), nat0))), wrex(s1, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), c0), nat0))))
  rexbidv(s1, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), c0), nat0)))

thm dgraaval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ AA →(degAA ` c0)= inf({ s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` c0)= 0))}, ℝ, <))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, caa, cdgraa, inf({ s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` c0)= 0))}, ℝ, <), inf({ s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` hs0)= 0))}, ℝ, <))
  infeq1d({ s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` hs0)= 0))}, cr, clt, { s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` c0)= 0))}, hs0 = c0)
  rabbidv(s0, cn, hs0 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` hs0)= 0)), ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` c0)= 0)))
  rexbidv(s1, ((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }), hs0 = c0, ((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` hs0)= 0), ((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` c0)= 0))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, (deg ` s1)= s0, (s1 ` hs0)= 0, (s1 ` c0)= 0)
  fveqeq2(hs0, c0, s1, nat0)
  df-dgraa(hs0, s0, s1)
  infex({ s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` c0)= 0))}, cr, clt)
  ltso()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(caa)
  diff.hs0.c(inf({ s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s1)= s0 ∧(s1 ` c0)= 0))}, ℝ, <))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  eqeltrd((degAA ` c0), { hs0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s0 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` c0)= 0))}, inf({ hs0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s0 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` c0)= 0))}, ℝ, <), c0 ∈ AA)

  sylancr(c0 ∈ AA, inf({ hs0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s0 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` c0)= 0))}, ℝ, <)∈ { hs0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s0 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` c0)= 0))}, { hs0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s0 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` c0)= 0))} ⊆(ℤ≥ ` 1), { hs0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s0 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` c0)= 0))} ≠ ∅)
  sseqtri({ hs0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s0 ∈((Poly ` ℚ)\ { 0p }),((deg ` s0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` c0)= 0))}, (ℤ≥ ` 1), cn)
